page.title: 09Darras Hall Housing Estate
page.content: The estate is predominantly a middle class area with a large number of professional,academic and executive parents.Current house prices start around Â£50,000. Many homes have four bedrooms:sun-rooms,cloakrooms,utility rooms and studies are frequently cited in lists of facilities.The following household possessions typify current life-styles. { {"Survey-Class 5--out of 29 children" Have a telephone................28 Have 2 cars.....................22 Have a micro-computer...........21 Have a dish-washer..............16 Have a video....................12 Have 2 colour Television Sets...11 Have a micro-wave oven...........8 Have a food hostess trolley or food warmer.........5
